content.html: Another reminder: Twitter wouldn't even be this deep in the red if not for Musk's deal to buy it in the first place. It's effectively an LBO, and one he couldn't even afford and tried to get out of. Dumb billionaire does dumb thing on impulse and tries more dumb stuff to fix it.
content.value:
Another reminder: Twitter wouldn't even be this deep in the red if not for Musk's deal to buy it in the first place. It's effectively an LBO, and one he couldn't even afford and tried to get out of.
